tokyo-1.subtitle: Navigate the world's busiest intersection, then disappear into hidden alleys
tokyo-1.description: The scramble of a thousand footsteps fades as you slip into narrow lanes. Steam rises from ramen bowls. Tiny izakayas hum with quiet laughter. This is Tokyo at street level—alive, intimate, delicious.

Ichiran Ramen Experience.description: Solo dining booths, personal attention, perfect tonkotsu broth
Ichiran Ramen Experience.image_keywords: ichiran ramen shibuya solo booth tokyo

Takoyaki Stand Tour.description: Crispy octopus balls fresh off the griddle, bonito flakes dancing in the heat
Takoyaki Stand Tour.image_keywords: takoyaki street food tokyo crispy octopus

Izakaya Hopping.description: Tiny bars, cold beer, locals at the counter—the real Tokyo nightlife
Izakaya Hopping.image_keywords: nonbei yokocho tokyo izakaya bar alley night

tokyo-2.subtitle: Tokyo's oldest temple, where pilgrims and tourists walk the same path
tokyo-2.description: Incense smoke curls upward. Red lanterns glow against morning sky. Nakamise Street hums with vendors selling traditional sweets. Here, old Tokyo persists—unhurried, reverent, timeless.
nearby_cafes: Local tea houses on temple grounds

Temple Morning Prayer.description: Join monks in chanting as sunrise light filters through temple gates
Temple Morning Prayer.image_keywords: sensoji temple morning prayer tokyo monks

Nakamise Street Shopping.description: 250 meters of tradition—handmade crafts, sweet bean cakes, vintage postcards
Nakamise Street Shopping.image_keywords: nakamise street asakusa shopping traditional tokyo

Rickshaw Tour.description: Glide through backstreets while your guide shares neighborhood secrets

tokyo-3.subtitle: Step into a living digital dreamscape where art flows around you
tokyo-3.description: Walls dissolve. Flowers bloom across your feet. Light cascades like water. This isn't a museum—it's an alternate universe where technology breathes, and wonder is the only rule.

Crystal Universe.description: Walk among infinite LED lights, creating constellations with your smartphone
Crystal Universe.image_keywords: teamlab crystal universe tokyo led lights infinite

Forest of Resonating Lamps.description: Lanterns glow and ripple outward as you pass, creating waves of light
Forest of Resonating Lamps.image_keywords: teamlab forest lamps tokyo glowing interactive

Athletics Forest.description: Playful installations that respond to movement—climb, jump, slide through art
Athletics Forest.image_keywords: teamlab athletics forest tokyo interactive play

kyoto-1.subtitle: Ten thousand vermillion gates lead you up the sacred mountain
kyoto-1.description: Each torii gate is a donated prayer. As you climb, the crowd thins. By mid-mountain, there's only birdsong, mossy stone foxes, and endless red tunnels glowing in dappled light.
kyoto-1.best_time: Early morning (6-8 AM) or late afternoon
nearby_cafes: Traditional tea stalls at mountain rest points

Full Mountain Circuit.description: Complete the sacred loop to the summit—4km of gates, forest, and foxes
Full Mountain Circuit.image_keywords: fushimi inari summit hike kyoto mountain torii

Lower Shrine Tour.description: Stay below for the iconic gates and temple complex—easier, still magical
Lower Shrine Tour.image_keywords: fushimi inari main shrine kyoto gates entrance

Sunrise Photography.description: Arrive before dawn to catch golden hour light streaming through the gates
Sunrise Photography.image_keywords: fushimi inari sunrise golden hour kyoto photography

kyoto-2.subtitle: Walk through towering green stalks that creak and whisper in the wind
kyoto-2.description: Sunlight filters green. The air cools. Bamboo rises like cathedral columns, swaying, creaking, alive. It's otherworldly—a forest that feels like walking into a scroll painting.

Morning Grove Walk.description: Stroll the main path before crowds arrive—serene, silent, surreal
Morning Grove Walk.image_keywords: arashiyama bamboo pathway morning kyoto quiet empty

Tenryu-ji Temple Visit.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site with a pond garden designed for walking meditation
Tenryu-ji Temple Visit.image_keywords: tenryuji temple garden arashiyama kyoto pond zen

Togetsukyo Bridge.description: Cross the iconic wooden bridge over the Katsura River—mountain views all around
Togetsukyo Bridge.image_keywords: togetsukyo bridge arashiyama kyoto river wooden

kyoto-3.subtitle: A quiet ritual of matcha, sweets, and centuries of mindfulness
kyoto-3.description: You kneel on tatami. A host whisks matcha in slow, deliberate arcs. Each gesture is precise, purposeful. For one hour, the world shrinks to the sound of bamboo on ceramic.

Camellia Tea House.description: Intimate ceremony in a restored machiya with English-speaking tea master
Camellia Tea House.image_keywords: camellia tea house kyoto ceremony traditional matcha

En Tea Ceremony.description: Held within Kennin-ji Temple grounds—temple tour included
En Tea Ceremony.image_keywords: kennin-ji temple tea ceremony kyoto zen garden

Machiya Experience.description: Private ceremony in a traditional wooden townhouse, Hanamikoji Street setting
Machiya Experience.image_keywords: machiya tea ceremony gion kyoto traditional house

osaka-1.subtitle: Neon-lit chaos and the best street food in Japan
osaka-1.description: Glowing billboards reflect in the canal. Crowds swarm. The air smells of grilled octopus and fried dough. Welcome to Osaka's kitchen—loud, delicious, unforgettable.

osaka-2.subtitle: Golden castle rising from cherry blossom clouds
osaka-2.description: The castle towers above, regal and gleaming. Below, cherry trees bloom in waves of pink. You walk the grounds, feeling centuries of history beneath your feet.

osaka-3.subtitle: The beating heart of Osaka's food scene
osaka-3.description: Vendors call out. Fresh fish glisten on ice. The smell of grilled seafood fills the air. You taste, you explore, you leave full and happy.

ubud-1.subtitle: Descend into emerald layers carved by generations of Balinese farmers
ubud-1.description: Mist hangs low in the valley. Rice stalks sway. The terraces cascade like green stairs to the horizon. You walk narrow ridges, palms overhead, and realize this isn't a farm—it's a living sculpture.
nearby_cafes: Café Organic with rice field views

Sunrise Trek.description: Arrive at dawn to catch the golden light and mist rising off the paddies
Sunrise Trek.image_keywords: tegalalang rice terrace sunrise ubud golden light mist

Jungle Swing.description: Soar above the canopy on Bali's famous swings—thrilling, photogenic, unforgettable
Jungle Swing.image_keywords: bali jungle swing tegalalang rice terrace flying

Coffee Plantation Tour.description: Taste the world's most expensive coffee (Luwak) and see how it's made
Coffee Plantation Tour.image_keywords: bali luwak coffee plantation ubud tasting farm

ubud-2.subtitle: Ancient temple ruins overtaken by jungle—and hundreds of curious macaques
ubud-2.description: Monkeys leap between moss-covered statues. Stone temples crumble under vines. The forest feels alive—playful, chaotic, deeply spiritual. Watch your sunglasses. They're faster than you think.
nearby_cafes: Clear Café for raw vegan bowls
Café Organic in the rice fields

Morning Monkey Encounter.description: Walk the main forest paths while macaques play, eat, and occasionally photobomb you
Morning Monkey Encounter.image_keywords: ubud monkey forest macaques morning bali playful

Pura Dalem Temple.description: Explore the ancient Temple of Death, guarded by monkeys and shrouded in banyan roots
Pura Dalem Temple.image_keywords: pura dalem temple ubud monkey forest ancient stone

Dragon Bridge.description: Cross the iconic stone bridge flanked by dragon sculptures and flowing stream
Dragon Bridge.image_keywords: dragon bridge ubud monkey forest stone sculpture

ubud-3.subtitle: From morning market to your plate—learn the art of Balinese spice
ubud-3.description: You start at dawn in Ubud's market—sampling, haggling, laughing with vendors. Then, in a traditional kitchen, you chop, grind, sauté. By noon, you're eating a feast you made yourself.
nearby_cafes: Seniman Coffee Studio for post-class espresso

Paon Cooking Class.description: Family-run class starting at Ubud Market—authentic, welcoming, delicious
Paon Cooking Class.image_keywords: paon cooking class ubud market bali traditional family

Casa Luna.description: Legendary cooking school by Janet DeNeefe—polished, professional, flavorful
Casa Luna.image_keywords: casa luna cooking class ubud bali professional kitchen

Mama's Warung.description: Intimate village experience—cook in a local family's home, eat with them after
Mama's Warung.image_keywords: mamas warung cooking class ubud village bali home

canggu-1.subtitle: Ride your first wave on Bali's most iconic surf break
canggu-1.description: The ocean roars. Instructors guide you into position. You paddle, pop up, and suddenly—you're gliding. The wave carries you, the beach rushes closer, and for ten seconds, everything else disappears.
nearby_cafes: Crate Café for post-surf açaí bowls

Beginner Group Lesson.description: Learn the basics in a supportive group—board, wetsuit, and encouragement included
Beginner Group Lesson.image_keywords: canggu surf lesson group beginner echo beach bali

Private Coaching.description: One-on-one instruction for faster progress—perfect for nervous first-timers
Private Coaching.image_keywords: bali surf private coaching canggu one-on-one instructor

Advanced Reef Break.description: For experienced surfers—tackle the faster, more challenging waves at Old Man's
Advanced Reef Break.image_keywords: old mans canggu reef break advanced surf bali

canggu-2.subtitle: Infinity pools, cold cocktails, and sunsets that melt into the ocean
canggu-2.description: You float in an infinity pool, drink in hand, as the sun dips low. Music hums. Palm fronds sway. This is Bali at its most indulgent—effortlessly chic, perfectly lazy.

Finns Beach Club.description: Massive beachfront complex—pools, cabanas, DJ sets, and Bali's longest waterslide
Finns Beach Club.image_keywords: finns beach club bali canggu pool sunset party

The Lawn Canggu.description: Boutique beach club with green lawn, ocean views, and relaxed bohemian vibes
The Lawn Canggu.image_keywords: the lawn canggu beach club bali green grass ocean

La Brisa.description: Driftwood structures, beanbags on sand, seafood platters, and epic sunset views
La Brisa.image_keywords: la brisa bali canggu beach club driftwood sunset

canggu-3.subtitle: Flow through poses as the sky turns gold over the rice fields
canggu-3.description: The mat beneath you. The horizon ahead. You breathe, stretch, balance. As the class ends, the sun sinks low, and you feel lighter—like you've shed something you didn't need.

The Practice Bali.description: Popular yoga studio with rooftop shala—ocean breeze, sunset views, strong community
The Practice Bali.image_keywords: the practice bali canggu yoga rooftop sunset class

Desa Seni Village.description: Yoga retreat in traditional wooden houses—peaceful, grounded, authentic Bali
Desa Seni Village.image_keywords: desa seni bali yoga village traditional canggu retreat

Serenity Eco Guesthouse.description: Small, intimate classes in a lush garden setting—ideal for beginners
Serenity Eco Guesthouse.image_keywords: serenity eco guesthouse canggu yoga garden peaceful
